name: Escape Mystery Bedroom - Can You Escape Before It's Too Late?
name_original: Escape Mystery Bedroom - Can You Escape Before It's Too Late?
description:
Escape Mystery Bedroom - Can You Escape Before It's Too Late?

Hi, genius, Use your puzzle skills to find the way to open each door in order to escape the bedroom!

- Features -
Unique brain teasers
Challenging logic puzzles
Easy to start – hard to put down
Delightful graphics
Outside of the box thinking
Balanced difficulty

- How to play -
Find and combine items
Solve mini-puzzles

Good luck and enjoy the game!
